article_title: Lancaster General Health looking at joining U. Penn health system
article_text: More in Lancaster General Health Merger With the University of Pennsylvania Health System: Everything You Need to Know (8 of 29)

article_metadata.author: TIM STUHLDREHER | Business Writer

og.description: LG Health and the University of Pennsylvania Health System have signed a memorandum of understanding to explore "a consolidated relationship," the two organizations said Tuesday.
